front.title: American National Standard Requirements for Combustion Gas Turbine Driven Cylindrical Rotor Synchronous Generators
front.abstract: The requirements in this standard apply to 60 Hz open-ventilated air-cooled cylindrical rotor synchronous generators rated 10,000 kVA and above. All requirements and definitions, except as specifically covered in this standard, shall be in accordance with ANSI C50.10-1977 and C50.13-1977.
